role_dependencies: Installs Java on nearly any OS
Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs Android Studio on nearly any OS
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Android Studio on nearly any OS.
role_description_full_overview: Android Studio is the official integrated development environment for Google's Android operating system, built on JetBrains' IntelliJ IDEA software and designed specifically for Android development.
